item.description:
Beer paired with multi-course meal, featuring educational talk by brewers. This one is during beer week so they are doing two breweries and twice the tastings in one meal.

Where: Cambridge Common Restaurant, 1667 Massachusetts Ave., equidistant from Harvard Square and Porter Square T stations (walking distance)
How much: $50

Please note: the ONLY way to get a ticket is to BUY A TICKET IN ADVANCE on the Cambridge Common website. An RSVP on the meetup page DOES NOT guarantee a reservation! Please be sure to say you are with Nerd Fun meetup when making the reservation so we can be seated together. Please DO NOT RSVP HERE UNTIL YOU HAVE PURCHASED A TICKET, AND NOTE IT IN YOUR RSVP. Thanks!

TO PURCHASE A TICKET IN ADVANCE: http://www.cambridgec...
Click "Events" and scroll down to the JUNE 16 event, click link to purchase tickets.
FYI, this website has loud music (which you can turn off).

Wednesday 6/16/2010 Left Hand Brewing & Lake Placid Craft Brewing Beer Dinner
Premeal Beer: Left Hand 400 Pound Monkey AND Lake Placid Honey Rye!

~ Soup ~
Watermelon Gazpacho with a Spicy Shrimp Bruschetta~Paired with Left Hand Polestar Pilsner AND Lake Placid Maibock

~ Salad ~
Chop Salad with Ranch, Egg, Applewood Bacon,
Cherry Tomatoes, and Avocado~Paired with Left Hand Chainsaw AND Lake Placid IPA

~ Entree ~ [choice of]
Herb Roasted Half Chicken with a Lake Placid Lemon Wit Butter,
Grilled Asparagus, and Smashed Potatoes~Paired with Lake Placid Wit

OR

Ginger Crusted Salmon with a Cucumber Salad and Basmati Rice~Paired with Left Hand JuJu Ginger

~ Dessert ~
Milk Stout Chocolate Cake with UBU Ice Cream~Paired with Left Hand Milk Stout AND Lake Placid UBU
item.how_to_find_us: Remember to mention the Nerd Fun meetup when you buy your ticket so they can create a table for us. I look like my picture.
item.name: Beer Dinner at Cambridge Common
